songs.title: Take Your Time
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I just wanna treat you right
Heavens and an angel say I owe you my own life, and
I can't live without your love
'Cause you're in my thoughts
Every morning noon to night

[Verse 2]
Would you give me the chance?
Call me all that I am
Put our feelings on the line
And your heart in my hands

[Verse 3]
I just wanna treat you right
Would you give it a try?
Like true love is intertwined

[Pre-Chorus]
Take your time
I'm all yours and I...
If you could read my mind
You'd know that talking is just fine

[Chorus]
If you need some time
To work on your mind
If you're looking for a lover
Then a lover's what you find
Can't escape your lie
Everywhere I see
Not a trigger I be lovin'
You'd just stay and not me

[Verse 1]
I just wanna treat you right
Heavens and an angel say I owe you my own life, and
I can't live without your love
'Cause you're in my thoughts
Every morning noon to night

[Verse 2]
Would you give me a chance?
Call all that I am
Put our feelings on the line
And your heart in my hands

[Verse 3]
I just wanna treat you right
Would you give it a try?
Like true love is intertwined

[Bridge]
If the stars align
And you were mine
At the waiting line, yeah
'Cause I know it's lovin' modern touch

[Chorus]
If you need some time
To work over your mind
If you're lookin' for a lover
Then a lover's what you find
Can't escape your lie
Everywhere I see
Not a trigger I be lovin'
You'd just stay and not me

[Verse 1]
I just wanna treat you right
Heavens and an angel say I owe you my own life, and
I can't live without your love
'Cause you're in my thoughts
Every morning noon to night

[Chorus]
If you need some time
To work over your mind
If you're lookin' for a lover
Then a lover's what you find
Can't escape your lie
Everywhere I see
Not a trigger I be lovin'
You'd just stay and not me

[Verse 1]
I just wanna treat you right
Heavens and an angel say I owe you my own life, and
I can't live without your love
'Cause you're in my thoughts
Every morning noon to night

[Chorus]
If you need some time
To work over your mind
If you're lookin' for a lover
Then a lover's what you find
Can't escape your lie
Everywhere I see
Not a trigger I be lovin'
You'd just stay and not me

[Outro]
Yeah
Would you give it try, like true love is intertwined?
Would you give it try, like true love is intertwined?
Would you give it try, like true love is intertwined?
Would you give it try, like true love is intertwined?
